My favorite team is Houston Rockets and my favorite NBA player is James Hatden. James Harden lives on Cochrane Street wherras his parents live in Clovelly Court. My friend Margaret is on her period so she can't have cold drinks, coffee, ice cream and tomatoes right now. Her aunt flow is visiting. She has bad stomach cramps right now so she's taken a day of menstrual leave. Her sister too feels bloated which means her period is gonna come soon. She has got bad cramps lately too bit her period is late this month; it's one week late. She's been so emotional recently because it's that time of the month again. Her cousin Margot missed her period so she might be pregnant. Her cousin's husband Leonard did his leg workout this afternoon during which he overtrained his quadriceps, hamstrings, calves and gluteal muscles so he's been having a cramp in his legs and left foot. Margaret's brother will be attending a party next Tuesday but I won't be going woth him for fear that I might cramp his style. I don't want to put any pressure on him that would cramp his style. I don't want him to be under pressure which would cramp his style.

Michael Jordan is the greatest basketball player of all time. I like Vince Carter in his prime who is regarded as the greatest slam dunker of his time.🏀🏀 My friend Margaret is on her period so she cannot drink cold drinks and coffee and eat ice cream and tomatoes right now. Her aunt flow is visiting. She's getting bad cramps right now so she's gonna take a few days of period leave. Her sister feels bloated as well which means her period is gonna come soon. She's had painful stomach cramps lately too but her period is late this month; it is a week late. She's been so emotional recently because it is that time of the month again. Her cousin Christina missed her period so she might be pregnant. Her cousin's husband Leonard did his arm workout this evening during which he overtrained his triceps, biceps and forearms so he has got cramp in his arms. Margaret's brother is gonna go to a party next Friday but I'm not gonna go with hom in case I cramp his style. I don't wanna put any pressure on him that would cramp his style.
